name: Casimiro de Oliveira
introduction: Casimiro Antnio Pinto de Oliveira (born 8 September 1907 in Porto, Grande Porto, Norte, Kingdom of Portugal  died 22 November 1970 in the same place) was a Portuguese racing driver.  He drove at the 1938 Rio de Janeiro Grand Prix and was entered for the 1958 Portuguese Grand Prix but did not arrive.
